title: Career
content:
The Project being large in nature (Production of overburden 1.00 lakh CuM daily) employs large mining machineries like 50 Ton Excavators, Volvo 20.3 CuM Tippers, with associated large Dozers and Motor Graders and support vehicles.
 Equipment being expensive in nature, the Company needs highly skilled operators and drivers, Mining Managers, Site Supervisors and Certified Overman and Surveyors. We have partly recruited and we need people for ongoing expansion.
